name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Crystal Clocks
summary:
Take aim with the Dragshot, a modified slingshot with a creeping twist. Complete 11 different puzzle rooms as you manage platform switches and crystal activation sequences. Puzzles are primarily time-based, so having a good handle on aiming and being able to maintain patience is key. Estimated completion time is one hour.

Looking for an extra challenge? Scattered around the level are four optional Pieces of Hearts. Stay alert for a special hint system that will help you find them all. Although custom music was originally planned and arranged, I was not able to get it working for this release. Listen to it here: • Trailer Theme - The Legend of Zelda: ...

This mod was originally submitted as an entry for Hylian Modding’s first competition. This update adds additional puzzles, new collectibles, new rooms like an ending room, a visual overhaul, various bug fixes, and several quality of life changes.
